thread.title: Asian Markets Rise on China Easing
thread.title_full: Asian Markets Rise on China Easing - WSJ

author: Chao Deng
title: Asian Markets Rise on China Easing
text:
Asian markets rallied to their highest levels in roughly two months Monday, after China unleashed more measures to prop up the country’s growth, now at its slowest since the global financial crisis.
Japan’s Nikkei Stock Average was up 1.3%, while Australia’s S&P/ASX 200 and South Korea’s Kospi both gained 0.3%. Shares in Japan and Australia were trading at their highest levels since August, while Korea has rallied to its highest...
